        public void setAlive(boolean value)

      • setOrigin

        public final void setOrigin(PointF origin)
        Specified by:
        setOrigin in interface Displayable
        Parameters:
        origin - the origin to set. Origin is the local point and (0,0) by default. Origin is used to define offset of this object and also the center of rotation and scaling.

      • updateMatrix

        protected void updateMatrix()
        Find the global bounds of this object that takes position, scale, rotation, skew... into account. Used mainly for Camera clipping and bounds hit-testing.
